mapper.insert: insert into depositBase (depositID, dclsMonth, comNum, prdNum, comName, prdName, joinWay, interest, spclCnd, maxLimit, joinMember) values (#{depositID}, #{dclsMonth}, #{comNum}, #{prdNum}, #{comName}, #{prdName}, #{joinWay}, #{interest}, #{spclCnd}, #{maxLimit}, #{joinMember})

insert into depositOption (depositID, dclsMonth, comNum, prdNum, intrRate, intrRate2, saveTrm, intrRateTypeName) values (#{depositID}, #{dclsMonth}, #{comNum}, #{prdNum}, #{intrRate}, #{intrRate2}, #{saveTrm}, #{intrRateTypeName})
mapper.select: SELECT db.depositID, db.comName, db.prdName, joinWay, interest, spclCnd, maxLimit, joinMember, intrRate, MAX(intrRate2) as intrRate2, saveTrm, intrRateTypeName FROM depositBase as db inner join depositOption as do on db.depositID = do.depositID group by prdName
